name: Paper Kingdom
description:
Hello there.

I know that my game doesn't fit the theme of the jam, but I was really not inspired. So here is what I made in 48 hours.

This is a small strategy game where you have to build your kingdom and armies to defeat "packs" and hordes of Orks.

I Didn't have time to make a decent tutorial so I hope the Interface speaks for itself.

I really hope you like the game :D
Now I'm going to sleep.

Game created by Maxence Jacquot

Assets by Steven Collins

Additional graphics by Eléa Dupont
